Post_Title: R/AltRightChristian is spreading fake news about George Flyod' s death, blaming it on an hearth attack caused by the assumption of meth and other drugs.

Threads.Reply_Text:
What is even the point of trying to tell people that?

Doctors gave an autopsy, THE WORLD IS RIOTING

Like who is gonna stop breaking shit look at this and go "ohhhhhhhhh"

Replies.Reply_Text:
Its because they assume/hope that most people are like them and are just looking for a reason to throw this whole thing away and go back to "normality."

People tend to bias along the lines of "if I do it everyone does it" you can sum it up with "I am the normal(This [https://www.sbs.com.au/news/the-most-typical-person-in-theworld#:\~:text=According%20to%20statistics%20released%20by,is%2C%20based%20on%20those%20statistics.](https://www.sbs.com.au/news/the-most-typical-person-in-the-world#:~:text=According%20to%20statistics%20released%20by,is%2C%20based%20on%20those%20statistics.) would be "normal")" regardless of actual numbers and what the normal would actually be because its what they see it's what the world is.
